attributes.action: Make the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland an Armed Neutral Country.
attributes.additional_details:
We petition the government to debate that we will become a neutral country with no more wars on foreign shores.
Our countries youth and their families will no longer support politicians declaring war and then walking away when it gets a bit messy.
No more British blood should be wasted on such as this. We must keep our Armed military force for our own defence, here at home in this country.
